result.arabic_text: إِنَّمَا يَأۡمُرُكُم بِٱلسُّوٓءِ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَأَن تَقُولُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: He only orders you to commit evil and immoral deeds, and to say concerning Allah what you do not know[74].
result.footnotes: [74] Falsely claiming that Allah made one thing lawful and another unlawful.
